segments.text: Not for the others , but for me . I was in the library going over my lessons when suddenly one of my roommates came in . He told me that I was wanted on the phone in my dormitory , and that person would call me again several minutes later .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you hurry back to the bedroom ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I went back to the dorm only to find my roommates laughing and shouting " April Fool , April Fool " .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , your classmates took you in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Only then did I realize it was April Fools ' Day .
segments.speaker: S1
